title: Breville® Ice Cream Maker: Tips and Tricks the Smart Scoop™ BCI600XL
description:
The Smart Scoop™ is Brevilles easy to use ice cream maker with automatic hardness settings. Its the first ice cream maker that automatically senses the hardness of the mixture based on your selection and keeps it ready until its time to serve.
Features:
• Capacity 1.5 quart (1L) bowl capacity
• Controls Automatic and manual
• Nonstick Surface
• Additional Features
o 12 Hardness settings; sorbet frozen yogurt gelato and ice cream
o Pre-cool to optimal operating temperature
o Keep Cool for up to 3 hours
o Self Refrigerating Compressor
o Fully automatic or manual functionality
o Transparent lid with large add-ins opening
o Temperature conversion
o Volume / music adjustment
o Child lock
• Included Accessories
o Removable bowl
o Removable paddle
o Cleaning brush
• Construction
o Stainless steel housing
o BPA Free Material
